//: This exists to make the seraphic shade's mental-scarring effect behave sanely.
name: Otherworldly Side Effects
iv_message: Seeing this is probably a bug.
mutagen_message: Seeing this is probably a bug.
memorial_message: Was scarred by contact with something that did not belong in this world.

name: Explorer of The Veil
iv_message: You feel an otherworldly presence reaching out to you.
mutagen_message: If you can read this, this is probably a bug.
memorial_message: Pierced the veil between worlds.

name: Acolyte of the Sacrament
mutagen_message: You feel unearthly life flow through your body.
iv_message: You feel a powerful resonance throughout your body, another irreversible step down the Path to Power.
memorial_message: Gained power from the Dragonblood Sacrament.

//: This exists to make pattern scrolls work once again.  The more things change, the more they stay the same...
name: Dummy Mutation Category
iv_message: Seeing this is probably a bug.
mutagen_message: Seeing this is probably a bug.
memorial_message: Furthered their knowledge of the Beyond.
